original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND c.Score=0 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-23 02:00:12' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 13:52:41' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-10-06 21:41:26' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.VoteTypeId=2
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-10-06 21:41:26'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E4.PostId=E3.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.FavoriteCount >= 0 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-23 02:00:12' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 13:52:41')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E4E3.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E4E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E4E3E2.PostId=E5.PostId)
